name: Smartrobot
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, turn off light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This is an intelligent hardware,To use your Amazon Echo control light, make sure you have the latest Alexa app on your device. This will require your AllocacocSmart App account and password to authorize Alexa to access your devices.To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your AllocacocSmart account and discover your devices. When using the skill, you need to specify by name which device to use. You can set the devices' name in AllocacocSmart app which controls your devices. And then you can control the devices' light.Then talk directly to the Amazon Echo through the Alexa. For example, turn on <device' name>.
